Class XPath2FilterContainer

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
TransformParam
public class XPath2FilterContainer
extends ElementProxy
implements TransformParam

Implements the parameters for the XPath Filter v2.0.

$Author: raul $
See Also:
